Class Land

  • java.lang.Object
    • Land

  • public class Land
extends Object
    this class is the draws the background and on top of the background it draws a noise texture simulating the sand
    Version:
    05/03/2014 16:02:53
    Author:
    CRHanna

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private color backgroundColor
      the location vector.
      private int hSize
      height of the land.
      private float increment
      increments the xoffset and the yoffset for creating the texture on the background.
      private int landB
      Blue channel of the land.

      Green channel of the land.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Land() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayLand()
      this method draws the background as a rectangle with no strokes and the color value set to backgroundColor
      void texture()
      this method draws a noise map over the background this method was modified from the original code in order to better simulate the sand texture.
